Posts.Content: leighannmarie wrote: I should be getting my port out Thursday!!  Don't remember how long healing was when it was put in.  I am going on a camping kayaking trip next week.  Any one remember how long it was before they could get the incision wet?  I'm thinking I can get by with those waterproof clear bandages.  Anyway my appointment to talk to Dr.  is tomorrow.  My DH thinks I should wait til we get back from the trip but,  I want it out yesterday!!! Dx 4/10/2009, IDC, 1cm, Stage IIA, Grade 3, 1/4 nodes, ER-/PR-, HER2+ Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Port Removal After Care leighannmarie elmcity69
